channel.title: Language on home
channel.description: Recent content in Language on home

item.title: Going back to Japanese!
item.description: I spent a long time trying to learn Japanese, but at one point during the summer and this past academic year I really slacked on grammar. I had plenty of reasons to take a step back from it – I had a lot going on in my personal life which prevented me from having any mental capacity to focus. However, that isn’t the case anymore, so I believe it’s time for me to pick myself up by the bootstraps and go back to learning Japanese!
